title: Magic Stainless Steel Soap
subTitle: Reduce water consumption and save time

marketingArguments.title: An incredible efficiency solutions to get rid of smelly fingers.
marketingArguments.speech: If you love cooking with foods with stubborn smells (garlic, fish, onion mainly), you know it is a lot of good for cooking, but less for your hands. The smell can persist for hours and takes a lot of time and water to get rid of. Steel soap has been proven to be one of the best solutions for that.

marketingArguments.title: Widely reduce water consumption
marketingArguments.speech: With steel soap, no need to run liters of water to wash your hands since in just a few seconds the smell disappears.

marketingArguments.title: So Easy-to-use
marketingArguments.speech: The use is extremely simple just hold your hands under cold running water while rubbing the stainless steel for ten seconds.

marketingArguments.title: Save money
marketingArguments.speech: Don't put more soap or chemicals on your skin to get rid of these smells.
